product_name: Shimano R170 Road Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: Power to the pedal is the mantra for the Shimano R170 road bike shoes. Full of smart features, these high-performance bike shoes are made to be efficient workhorses so no energy gets wasted. Supple, stretch-resistant synthetic leather uppers feel good no matter how many hours you log in the saddle. Mesh panels provide breathability your feet will appreciate. Ratcheting microadjustable buckle and 2 offset rip-and-stick straps supply a precise, snug fit without pressure points. Ergonomic last puts foot in the most efficient postion on the up stroke. Sole is comprised of a lightweight carbon fiber composite and has an adjustable cleat mount. SPD-SL, Time, and Look cleat compatible. Cleats not included.
short_description: Power to the pedal is the mantra for the Shimano R170 road bike shoes. Full of smart features, these high-performance bike shoes are made to be efficient workhorses so no energy gets wasted.
